command: aws iam create-user --user-name emma.j.taylor --tags Key=FullName,Value='Emma J Taylor' Key=Department,Value='Marketing' Key=Title,Value='Business Analyst' Key=Email,Value='emma.j.taylor.consulting@outlook.com' Key=Location,Value='Seattle, WA' --output json
explanation: Creates a new low-privileged AWS IAM user with rich, believable profile tags to develop a persistent cloud persona that blends into a marketing/business analyst role.
rationale_steps: Establish a distinct cloud identity for persona building.
Embed realistic metadata (name, role, contact, location) via tags to enhance legitimacy.
Ensure output is JSON for automation and tracking.
